title: What Typeface is this?
content:
Can anyone identify this font for me? Lo X

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324012343im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_4046.jpg)

 [‹ obus logo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324012343/http:/typophile.com/node/43475 "Go to previous forum topic") [Someone must know this font! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080324012343/http:/typophile.com/node/43468 "Go to next forum topic")
author: lolitayaya

comments.content:
Don’t know about the typeface, but I love that track by Nelson Riddle Lolitayaya.

Nick Cooke

Hi Lolita,  
 It’s Bauhaus and called Spartan. Lolita X
Thanks Lolita. You are clever! Lolita X
